page.title: 10Transport on Herm.
page.content: The level of the tide will decide where you land in Herm. If the sea is above half-tide you will land at the harbour, if it is lower the landing is at Rosiere Steps, further to the south.Travel on the island is generally on foot. There are no cars. The farm has tractors,and there are two land-rovers and tractors with trailers for cargo and luggage. These meet every boat, and the arrival of the first boat each morning is an important event on the island. There are paths which go right round the island, as well as from east to west and north to south.
